alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 17 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Ohio, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 215 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Water levels at Duck Creek have crested, but continue above flood stage. Therefore, flooding will continue at Macksburg and Whipple as well as other locations along it, and other small creeks and streams in the warned area, through tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 606 PM EDT, Flooding is ongoing in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Marietta, Williamstown, Macksburg, Lower Salem and Devola. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
